summary: A Platoon of U.S. Soldiers in Afghanistan searching for Taliban become trapped in a cave and are hunted down by a deadly creature.
cast: Danny Trejo|Nick Chinlund|Adrian Paul|Cleveland Berto|Kevin Grevioux|Cleo Anthony|Fahim Fazli|Masika Kalysha|Justin Arnold|Essam Ferris|Reka Rene|Aria London|Ryan McIntyre|John David Gregory|Juan Feldman|Anoop Simon|Pat Jankiewicz|Robert Tarpinian|Miles Cooper|Benny Mora|Matt Musgrove|Mingyu Chu|Nicolas Charles|Linda Jossana|Adam Kokesh|Joseph Albrecht|Fito De la Parra|Ny'acies Divine|Calvin Primich|Ken Houk|Derrick Hensman|Jay Charlot|John McFarland|John Vargas|Eric Anfinson|Albert Medina
director: Directors: Cire Hensman (as Eric Hensman), Matthew Hensman (co-director)
title: THE PREY: Legend of Karnoctus
